Leia Inc. | Menlo Park, CA | Software Engineers | Full-time | leiainc.com

At Leia our driving purpose is to Light up Life. Screens come alive in richer, deeper, more beautiful ways. Flipping seamlessly between 2D and 3D we make mobile experiences truly immersive: no glasses, no tracking, no fuss. Alongside our display technology we are developing Leia Loft™ — a whole new canvas. A space to create, share and experience holographic content in entirely new ways.

We're shipping our first consumer hardware product, the RED Hydrogen One phone, later this year. As part of this effort, we're building a number of Android applications to allow users to create and consume 3D content. We're a small team, and there is tons of opportunity for product ownership and engineering leadership.
